mapper.select: SELECT pk_ChargingOrder, chOr_Code, chOr_AppointmenCode, chOr_PileNumber, chOr_UserId, chOr_Type, chOr_Moeny, chOr_QuantityElectricity, chOr_TimeQuantum, chOr_Muzzle, chOr_ChargingStatus, chOr_TransType, chOr_OrderType FROM tbl_ChargingOrder where pk_ChargingOrder#{pkChargingOrder}

SELECT pk_ChargingOrder, chOr_Code, chOr_AppointmenCode, (ep.elPi_ElectricPileCode) AS eleCode, (ui.usIn_FacticityName) AS usName, (ui.usIn_Phone) AS usPhone, chOr_Moeny, chOr_QuantityElectricity, chOr_TimeQuantum, (eh.ePHe_ElectricpileHeadName) AS eleheadName, chOr_ChargingStatus, chOr_TransType, chOr_OrderType FROM tbl_ChargingOrder where pk_ChargingOrder=#{pkChargingOrder} and chOr_Type=2

select count(pk_ChargingOrder) FROM tbl_ChargingOrder co left JOIN tbl_ElectricPile AS ep ON ep.elPi_ElectricPileCode = co.chOr_PileNumber inner join (select a.user_account, a.user_id,a.norm_real_name FROM tbl_user_normal_view a WHERE a.user_leval = '5') AS ui on ui.user_id = ep.elPi_UserId left JOIN tbl_ElectricPileHead AS eh ON eh.pk_ElectricPile = ep.pk_ElectricPile and eh.ePHe_ElectricpileHeadId = co.chOr_Muzzle
1=1 and chOr_ChargingStatus!=4
and ep.elPi_UserId = #{loginUserId}
and chOr_Code like concat('%',#{chorCode},'%')
and ep.elPi_ElectricPileCode like concat('%',#{eleCode},'%')
and chOr_ChargingStatus=#{chorChargingstatus}
and (ui.norm_real_name like concat('%',#{usName},'%') or ui.user_account like concat('%',#{usName},'%') )
and ep.elPi_ElectricPileName like concat('%',#{chargePointName},'%')
and ep.elPi_ElectricPileAddress like concat('%',#{chargePointAddress},'%')
and begin_charge_time>=#{beginChargetime}
and end_charge_time<=date_add(#{endChargetime}, interval 1 day)

SELECT pk_ChargingOrder, chOr_Code, chOr_AppointmenCode, ep_num AS cpn, (ep.elPi_ElectricPileCode) AS eleCode, (pb.puBu_CompanyName) AS comName, chOr_Moeny, chOr_QuantityElectricity, chOr_TimeQuantum, (eh.ePHe_ElectricpileHeadName) AS eleheadName, chOr_ChargingStatus, chOr_TransType, go.grou_GroupName, chOr_OrderType FROM tbl_ChargingOrder co INNER JOIN tbl_PureBusiness AS pb ON pb.pk_PureBusiness = co.chOr_UserId INNER JOIN tbl_ElectricPileHead AS eh ON eh.pk_ElectricpileHead = co.chOr_Muzzle INNER JOIN tbl_ElectricPile AS ep ON ep.pk_ElectricPile = co.chOr_PileNumber INNER JOIN tbl_Group AS go ON go.pk_Group = co.chOr_Type where pk_ChargingOrder=#{pkChargingOrder} and chOr_Type = 3

SELECT pk_ChargingOrder pkChargingorder, chOr_Code chorCode, chOr_AppointmenCode chorAppointmencode, ep_num AS cpn, ep.elPi_ElectricPileCode AS eleCode,
(select poSt_Address from tbl_powerstation where pk_PowerStation= ep.elPi_RelevancePowerStation) as chargePointAddress, (select poSt_Name from tbl_powerstation where pk_PowerStation= ep.elPi_RelevancePowerStation) as chargePointName, bv.company_name AS comName, chOr_Moeny chorMoeny, chOr_CouponMoney couponMoney, chOr_QuantityElectricity chorQuantityelectricity, chOr_TimeQuantum chorTimequantum, eh.ePHe_ElectricpileHeadName AS eleheadName, chOr_ChargingStatus chorChargingstatus, chOr_ChargeMoney chorChargemoney, chOr_ServiceMoney chorServicemoney, chOr_TransType chorTranstype, chOr_OrderType chorOrdertype, begin_charge_time beginChargetime, end_charge_time endChargetime, chor_parter_user_logo chorParterUserLogo, chOr_tipPower, chOr_peakPower, chOr_usualPower, chOr_valleyPower, tbre.chRe_JPrice , tbre.chRe_FPrice, tbre.chRe_PPrice , tbre.chRe_GPrice , start_soc startSoc, end_soc endSoc, (select uc_ExternalCardNumber from tbl_usercard where pk_UserCard= co.pk_UserCard ) as exterCardNumber, (select cv_vin_code from tbl_car_vin where pk_car_vin= co.pk_Coupon and co.chOr_Third_Type=2 ) as vinCode, (select cv_license_number from tbl_car_vin where pk_car_vin= co.pk_Coupon and co.chOr_Third_Type=2 ) as cvLicenseNumber from tbl_ChargingOrder co LEFT JOIN tbl_ElectricPile AS ep ON ep.elPi_ElectricPileCode = co.chOr_PileNumber LEFT JOIN tbl_ElectricPileHead AS eh ON eh.pk_ElectricPile = ep.pk_ElectricPile AND eh.ePHe_ElectricpileHeadId = co.chOr_Muzzle LEFT JOIN tbl_user_business_view bv ON bv.user_id = ep.elPi_UserId LEFT JOIN tbl_user u ON u.user_id = co.chOr_UserId LEFT JOIN tbl_chargingrecord tbre ON tbre.chRe_Code = co.chOr_Code
1=1 and chOr_ChargingStatus!=4
and exists (select 1 from tbl_usercard where pk_UserCard= co.pk_UserCard and uc_ExternalCardNumber like concat('%',#{exterCardNumber},'%'))
and exists (select 1 from tbl_car_vin where pk_car_vin= co.pk_Coupon and cv_isdelete=0 and co.chOr_Third_Type=2 and cv_vin_code like concat('%',#{vinCode},'%'))
and exists (select 1 from tbl_car_vin where pk_car_vin= co.pk_Coupon and cv_isdelete=0 and co.chOr_Third_Type=2 and cv_license_number like concat('%',#{cvLicenseNumber},'%'))
and exists( select 1 from tbl_user_business_view b where b.user_id=ep.elPi_UserId and EXISTS (select 1 from tbl_user_business_view b1 where b.busi_company_id=b1.busi_company_id and b1.user_id=#{loginUserId}))
and exists (select 1 from tbl_user a where a.user_leval = '3' and a.user_id = ep.elPi_UserId)
AND u.user_account like CONCAT('%',#{userAccount},'%') AND length(u.user_account) = 12
AND co.chOr_OrgNo in (SELECT c.cpy_CompanyNumber from tbl_company c where c.cpy_CompanyName like CONCAT('%',#{partnerName},'%'))
and chOr_Code like concat('%',#{chorCode},'%')
and chOr_ChargingStatus=#{chorChargingstatus}
and bv.company_name like concat('%',#{comName},'%')
and ep.elPi_ElectricPileCode like concat('%',#{eleCode},'%')
AND Exists (select 1 from tbl_powerstation where pk_PowerStation= ep.elPi_RelevancePowerStation and poSt_Name like concat('%',#{chargePointName},'%') )
AND Exists (select 1 from tbl_powerstation where pk_PowerStation= ep.elPi_RelevancePowerStation and poSt_Address like concat('%',#{chargePointAddress},'%') )
and begin_charge_time>=#{beginChargetime}
and end_charge_time<=date_add(#{endChargetime}, interval 1 day)
and ep.elPi_OwnProvinceCode = #{provinceCode}
and ep.elPi_OwnCityCode = #{cityCode}
and ep.elPi_OwnCountyCode = #{countryCode}
group by pk_ChargingOrder order by pk_ChargingOrder desc limit #{pager.offset},#{pager.numPerPage}

AND u.user_account like CONCAT('%',#{userAccount},'%') AND length(u.user_account) = 12

and chOr_Code like concat('%',#{chorCode},'%')

and bv.company_name like concat('%',#{comName},'%')
and ep.elPi_ElectricPileCode like concat('%',#{eleCode},'%')
AND Exists (select 1 from tbl_powerstation where pk_PowerStation= ep.elPi_RelevancePowerStation and poSt_Name like concat('%',#{chargePointName},'%') )
AND Exists (select 1 from tbl_powerstation where pk_PowerStation= ep.elPi_RelevancePowerStation and poSt_Address like concat('%',#{chargePointAddress},'%') )

SELECT count(distinct pk_ChargingOrder) FROM tbl_ChargingOrder co left JOIN tbl_ElectricPile AS ep ON ep.elPi_ElectricPileCode = co.chOr_PileNumber left JOIN tbl_ElectricPileHead AS eh ON eh.pk_ElectricPile = ep.pk_ElectricPile and eh.ePHe_ElectricpileHeadId = co.chOr_Muzzle LEFT JOIN tbl_user_business u on u.user_id = co.chOr_UserId left JOIN tbl_company c on c.cpy_CompanyNumber = co.chOr_OrgNo AND u.busi_company_id = c.pk_CompanyId
